IPay SDK Mobile Number Payment Method Voucher Code Make Payment s Checkout With IPay Proceed 1. Dial *170# and Choose Wallet (Option 6) .
 2. Choose My Approvals(Option 3).
 3. Enter your MOMO pin to retrieve your pending approval list.
 4. Choose the transaction to approve.
 5. Click on the Confirm button, once you're done. Confirm
